result.title: Product Manager
result.description:
Job Responsibility:
-  Analyze market needs and opportunities to shape ads automation and infrastructure product development
-  Deeply understand advertiser needs/requirements and product risk areas in order to prioritize
recommendations

Job Requirements:
- 2-7 years of work experience with digital advertising products or platforms
- Customer-service orientation and experience in a client-facing capacity (product marketing capacity is a plus)
result.notes: You can submit the application on our website OR email your resume to service@talentseer.com
